entry.title: Itch Relief Spray - Calms and Soothes Itchy Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natura Pets
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 48.50

Natura Pets Natural Itch Relief Spray is a herbal spray containing Aloe Vera, Neem Oil, Calendula Extract and pure essential oils formulated to soothe and cool the skin, while essential oils relieve irritated skin and reduce itching (250 ml)

  • 100% natural ,chemical free eco friendly anti-itch spray
  • Powerful antiviral, antifungal and antiseptic benefits
  • Helps itching, irritated skin, rashes, hot spots, ringworm and other skin problems
  • Soothes and cools the skin and brings healing and relief
  • Pleasant herbal smell with non-sticky ingredients
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Aqua, Aloe Vera (Aloe barbadensis), Calendula Oil Infused (Calendula officinalis Extract), Neem Oil (Melia azadirachta), Castor Oil (Ricinus communis), Vegetable Glycerin, Coconut based cleaning agents, Eucalyptus Oil (Eucalyptus Smithii), Peppermint Oil (Mentha piperita), Tea Tree Oil (0.2% Melaleuca alternifolia),  Niaouli Oil (Melaleuca viridiflora), Cedarwood Oil (Cedrus atlantica Bark), Sodium Bicarbonate, Natural Preservatives (Ecocert Approved)

How to Use

(NB - Not for use on cats!) Easy to use! Shake well! Simple spray between the fur right on to the irritated skin (avoiding eye and mouth areas). Massage in gently. Don’t forget to reward with a treat! May be applied several times a day to soothe irritations. Repeat daily as needed for desired results.  Avoid contact with eyes. If in eye, flush with water. If irritation persists contact a veterinarian. Store in a dark, cool place. Keep out of reach of children.

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.
entry.s:tag: Treatement for dog fungal infections on skin

entry.title: EveryPet Formula. Natural pet health supplement
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 135.00

The Herbal Pet EveryPet Formula is a blend of herbs, vitamins, probiotics and omega oils as a natural pet health supplement to supplement your pet’s diet and promote tip top health in dogs and cats. (200 g)

  • Contains all the essential vitamins and minerals that your pet requires for excellent health and vitality. 
  • Also helps to manage joint health and good digestion. 
  • Will maintain a healthy, glossy coat and strong bones. 
  • Contains powerful ingredients like Spirulina, Magnesium, Chia Seeds, Diatomaceous Earth, MSM & Seaweed Meal to name a few.
  • Simply sprinkle on food - very easy to administer.
  • Suitable for dogs and cats
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Vitamin A, Spirulina, Magnesium, Taurine, Chia Seed, Diatomaceous Earth, Vitamin D3, MSM, Fructo-oligosaccharides, Zinc, Iron, Copper, Vitamin B2, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B12, Seaweed Meal, Brewer's Yeast

Directions

Simply mix with wet food:

Daily amount:

Small pets [ <10kg ]: 1/2 tsp

Average pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1 level tsp

Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1 heaped tsp (5g)

Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 2 heaped tsps (10g)

    A 200g tub will last one large dog 40 days.

    Caution:

    • Not recommended for pets with ulcers or gallstones.
    • Not recommended for pregnant bitches.
    • Do not use if your pet has ulcers or gallstones
    • Don’t use together with blood thinning medication or nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
    • Discontinue immediately at any sign of adverse reaction

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Detangler Deodorant Coat Spray: Untangles fur & deodorises | Natura Pet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natura Pets
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 50.50

Natura Pets Lavender Detangler Spray conditions and deodorises your pet's coat, leaving it easy to brush and smelling gorgeous! Use anytime or after bathing or swimming. Contains 100% natural ingredients (250 ml) 

  • Helps to smooth & soften the coat so it is easy to comb through - perfect for long haired breeds!
  • Natural fur and skin deodoriser makes those furry snuggles even sweeter!
  • Use after bathing, swimming and even in-between baths as a natural pet deodorant
  • 100% natural ingredients - contains no soap, parabens, sulfates, petroleum-based Ingredients, artificial fragrances, SLS, DEA, synthetic dyes, perfumes or anything that would harm your pet or the environment!
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Aqua, Renewable coconut-based cleansers, Vegetable Glycerin, Aloe Vera, Macadamia Oil, Lavender Essential Oil, Vitamin-E, Sodium Bicarbonate, Natural Preservatives 

How to Use

Easy to use! Shake well. Spray directly onto your pet’s wet or dry fur holding the bottle about 5 -10 cm away from the fur and massage lightly into the skin and coat. Leave the mixture on without rinsing. Brush to provide softness and shine to pet’s coat. Lightly pull apart and separate the hair and then use a brush to patiently work the knot loose. Avoid spraying on the head and contact with eyes (you can spray on the outside of ears though). If product gets into the eyes, flush with water. If irritation persists contact a veterinarian. Store in a dark, cool place. Keep out of reach of children.

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Dried Turmeric Powder - Natural Supplement for Pets
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 46.50

The Herbal Pet's 100% Dried Turmeric Root Powder (200g) is a wonderful supplement for cats, dogs and horses!

  • Turmeric has long been used in both the Chinese and Indian systems of medicine, due to its  powerful medicinal value
  • Acts as a digestive aid, reduces the growth of cancerous cells, reduces arthritis symptoms, prevents Alzheimer's, treats Asthma and is as a powerful antioxidant
  • A 200g tub will last one average dog 2 months and one horse at least 20 days
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

100% dried Turmeric Root powder

Directions for use

Daily amount:

  • Dogs and cats: One quarter to 2 teaspoons per day, added to the same amount of oil (eg. cold pressed olive, linseed or coconut oil) and 3 twists of black pepper.  Mix well into the pet’s food.
  • Horses: One to two tablespoons per day, added to the same amount of oil (eg. cold pressed olive, linseed or coconut oil) and 7 to 14  twists of black pepper.  Mix well into the concentrated feed of the horse.

Note: This is a nutritional product and is not intended as a substitute for veterinary products or advice.

entry.title: Deep Conditioner for Dogs | Natura Pet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natura Pets
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 54.50

Natura Pets Hypo Allergen Dog Conditioner is a natural chemical-free environmentally friendly deep conditioner for dogs with allergy-prone skin. Moisturizes and conditions the fur and leaves your dog’s coat super soft and silky, without irritating sensitive, damaged or itchy skin. (495 ml)

  • Leaves coat super silky and easy to brush
  • Ideal for dogs with dry, damaged skin or long coats
  • Finest 100% natural ingredients, including organic coconut oil, macadamia nut oil, shea butter and soothing oatmeal
  • pH value is formulated for pets (pH7)
  • Paraben, Sulphate and Soap free
  • Use with Natura Pets Itch Relief Shampoo

Ingredients

Aqua, Renewable coconut-based conditioner, Vegetable Glycerin, Coconut Oil, Castor Oil, Shea Butter, Macadamia Oil, Avocado Oil, Jojoba Oil, Xantan Gum, Citric acid, Natural Preservatives (Ecocert approved) 

How to Use

Safe for use on dogs, cats, horses and humans. After bathing, while your pet is still wet, massage Natura Pets Conditioner gently and generously into the skin and coat. Allow the formula to soak in for a few minutes (we recommend giving your best friend a little massage to keep him calm and happy) and then rinse off thoroughly. After rinsing, dry off with thick towel. Avoid contact with eyes and ears!! This product is for external use only. Store in a dark, cool place.

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.
entry.s:tag: Natura Pet Hypo Allergen Natural Dog Conditioner

entry.title: Ear Cleanser for dogs and cats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natura Pets
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 49.50

Natura Pets All Natural Pet Ear Cleanser will safely clean your pet's ears while relieving the discomfort of itchy, smelly and dirty ears. The soothing natural ingredients will condition and moisturize, and help to prevent future infections.(195 ml)

  • 100% natural cleanser safely removes ear wax, debris and unpleasant odours
  • Regular use helps to keep pet ears infection-free
  • Safe, non-toxic and non-irritating, even for dogs and cats with allergies and sensitive ears
  • Soothing organic oils, Aloe vera and Witch Hazel combine to create a healthy ear environment
  • Gentle enough for to use daily if you need to, as well as after swimming and baths
  • Clean, non-sticky ingredients
  • Eco-friendly, Chemical and Alcohol-free

Ingredients

Aqua, Renewable coco nut-based cleanser, Vegetable Glycerin, Aloe Vera (Aloe barbadensis), Calendula Oil Infused (Calendula officinalis Extract), Witch Hazel (Hamamelis virginiana), Castor Oil (Ricinus communis), Coconut Oil (Capric Triglyceride), Rosemary Essential Oil (Rosmarinus officinalis), Sodium Bicarbonate, Natural Preservatives (Ecocert Approved)

How to Use

Shake well. Squeeze onto cotton ball and gently clean ear and ear canal. If it is needed, apply generously to fill ear canal. Gently massage the base of the canal for 30-60 seconds to loosen wax. Attempt to clean ear with clean cotton ball. Let your dog to shake his or her head after cleaning. Don’t forget to reward with a treat! Repeat 2–3 times a week as needed or after swimming or bathing. Do not use the same cotton ball or swab in each ear. Never insert swabs or sharp objects into pet’s ears. This product is for use in ear only. Avoid contact with eyes. If in eye, flush with water. If irritation persists contact a veterinarian. Store in a dark, cool place. Keep out of reach of children

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.
entry.s:tag: How to stop smelly ears in cats
How to stop smelly ears in dogs

entry.title: Joint Formula for Healthy Joints
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 158.00

The Herbal Pet Joint Formula is a natural chemical-free joint supplement for dogs and helps to maintain healthy joints in all dogs, including active dogs, elderly dogs and those with stiff, painful joints. Contains Devil's Claw and Glucosamine Sulphate. (200 g)

  • A blend of herbs and nutrients formulated to nutritionally support active, stiff, old or arthritic pets. 
  • Helps to reduce inflammation, pain and stiffness
  • Regular use improves the health of joints and cartilage
  • Non-toxic with no unwanted side effects
  • Locally made to reduce your carbon footprint

Ingredients

Devil's Claw, MSM, Glucosamine, Evening Primrose, Fenugreek, and Seaweed meal

Directions

Simply mix with wet food:

  • Small pets [ <10kg ]: 1/2 tsp
  • Average pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1 level tsp
  • Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1 heaped tsp (5g)
  • Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 2 heaped tsps (10g)

A 200g tub will last one large dog 40 days.

Caution:

  • Not recommended for pets with ulcers or gallstones.
  • Not recommended for pregnant bitches.
  • Do not use if your pet has ulcers or gallstones
  • Don’t use together with blood thinning medication or nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
  • Discontinue immediately at any sign of adverse reaction

entry.title: Cannapaw CBD Oil Paired With MCT - 200mg/30ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cannapaw
Type: CBD Oil
Price: 197.00

Cannapaw's CBD Oil (200mg/30ml) is a clear blend of certified USDA Organic Broad Terpene Spectrum CBD, paired with MCT (Medium Chain Triglycerides), suitable for all animals. Designed to help pets feel more energetic and helps ease joint pain, inflammation, anxiety and so much more.

  • Improve behavioural problems like persistent barking, chewing furniture, aggression, nervous tremors or urinating and defecating in the home
  • Acts as an antibacterial, antiviral and anti-fungal
  • Promotes vitality, immune system and overall welness
  • May assist in the holistic treatment of cancer and reduce cancer risks
  • Helps promote the optimum functioning of nervous system and seizure control
  • Reduces joint pain and inflammation
  • Cannapaw's CBD oil is Co2 extracted and free from any herbicides, pesticides, GMO products, solvents or any other form of additive

Ingredients

Certifed USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD, MCT Oil, Lecithin, Biodegradable Preservative (Pureganic)

Directions for use

Cannapaw CBD Oil for pets may be mixed with food for easy dosage. The recommendation is to start low and see how your pet does and then increase to the dose that works best for your pet.

Start with the lower dose and slowly increase to the upper dose if necessary, depending on your pet's health needs.

Cats and small dogs 3 - 5 drops at night
Medium dogs 5 - 10 drops at night

Large dogs 10 - 15 drops at night

In severe cases, you can add a dose of 5 drops in the morning.

entry.title: Hemp Body Spray for dogs and cats with irritated skin | Natura Pet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natura Pets
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 57.00

Natura Pet's Hemp Body Spray (200ml) provides a natural solution for allergies, burned skin, dry skin, fungal infections, hot spots, itchy skin, sensitive skin, skin inflammations, wounds, burns, puncture injuries.

  • Pleasant, herbal smell with pure essential oils
  • In just a few days you'll see a noticeable difference in the health of your dog's skin and coat
  • Eco-friendly, cruelty-free and chemical-free

Aqua, Aloe Vera (Aloe barbadensis), Calendula Oil Infused (Calendula officinalis), Hemp Oil (Cannabis Sativa), Vegetable Glycerin, Coconut based cleaning agents, Cedarwood Oil (Cedrus atlantica Bark), Rosemary Essential oil (Rosmarinus Offcinalis), Natural Preservatives

Directions for use

Spray between the fur right onto the irritated skin (avoiding eye and mouth areas). Massage it into the skin. Repeat daily as needed for desired results.

Safe for cats! For external use only. Avoid eye contact or ingestion. If irritation persists contact a veterinarian. Store in a dark, cool place.

entry.title: Insect Repellent Anti-Bug Spray: Natural Defense!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natura Pets
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 49.00

Natura Pets Anti-Bug Spray (195ml) is a natural insect repellent spray which protects your dogs and horses naturally and is safe, non-toxic and 100% natural, with natural repellents for biting insects (ticks, fleas & mosquitoes)

  • Protects against biting insects (ticks, fleas & mosquitoes) 
  • Perfect for use before, during, and after walking, hunting trips, camping trips, day hikes, or wilderness events. 
  • Can also be sprayed on bedding
  • Pleasant, refreshing spray will make it even nicer to snuggle up to your favourite furry friend!
  • 100% natural earth-friendly ingredients, well known to repel insects
  • Safe enough to use on humans too!
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Pure essential oils of Citronella, Lavender, Rose Geranium and Khakibos (Tagetes Minuta) with Aqua and Vegetable Glycerin 

How to Use

(NB - Not for use on cats!) For use on dogs, horses and humans (not cats!). Shake this spray well before using. Spray all over your pet or onto affected areas and rub down into the skin and fur. Apply enough sprays to provide adequate coverage: on back, underside, legs, back of neck, base of tail and outside ears (avoiding eye and mouth areas). Reapply when scent disappears. For complete protection, spray onto their bedding too. Don’t forget to reward with a treat! Avoid contact with eyes. If product accidentally gets into the eye, flush with water. If irritation persists contact a veterinarian. Store in a dark, cool place.

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Breath Freshening Spray for Dogs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natura Pets
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 37.50

﻿Transform bad breath into natural fresh breathing with this Natural Breath Freshener. Natura Pets Natural Breath Freshener helps to remove plaque and tartar buildup for a cleaner, fresher and healthier mouth for dogs and controls the bacteria that cause bad breath. (195 ml)

  • Chemical free eco friendly natural breath freshener for dogs
  • Makes those sloppy kisses so much better!
  • Controls bad breath by fighting odour-causing bacteria
  • Cleans & deodorises teeth & gums and prevents gum infection
  • 100% natural ingredients - contains no soap, parabens, sulfates, petroleum-based Ingredients, artificial fragrances, SLS, DEA, synthetic dyes, perfumes or anything that would harm your pet or the environment!
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Aqua, Aloe Vera, Vegetable Glycerin, Baking Soda, Natural Preservatives Peppermint, Spearmint, Tea Tree and Eucalyptus Food Grade Essential Oils.

How to Use

(NB - Not for use on cats!) Safe for dogs 4 weeks and older! (may also be used on husbands too) Easy to use! No rinsing or brushing required. Shake well! Simply spray into your dog's mouth around teeth, tongue and gum line once or twice a day right after your dog's meal. Or add 1- 2 Tablespoons to the water bowl. Re-add each time you refill the bowl. Avoid contact with eyes. If in eye, flush with water. If irritation persists, contact a veterinarian. Store in a dark, cool place.

PS Natura Pets Oral Care Breath Freshener for Dogs should be used along with a regular dental care routine and is not a substitute for tooth brushing or dental check ups at your vet. 

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Hypo-Allergen Shampoo for Sensitive Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natura Pets
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 57.00

Natura Pets Hypo Allergen Shampoo is a natural chemical-free environmentally friendly shampoo for pets with sensitive, allergy prone skin. Contains 100% natural ingredients and is  gentle enough to use for dogs, cats, puppies and kittens. (500 ml)

  • Safe, gentle & natural shampoo for sensitive & allergy-prone skins
  • Ideal for allergic pets, dogs, cats, puppies & kittens
  • 100% natural ingredients - contains no soap, parabens, sulfates, petroleum-based Ingredients, artificial fragrances, SLS, DEA, synthetic dyes, perfumes or anything that would harm your pet or the environment!
  • Contains organic coconut oil, aloe, jojoba oil  & essential oils to clean & condition
  • Optimally pH balanced for your pet's skin (pH7) 
  • Will not wash off topical flea treatments
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Aqua, Renewable coconut-based cleansers, Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil, Xantan Gum, Citric acid, Natural Preservatives

How to Use

Wet fur with warm water. Apply shampoo to the wet fur. Rub in briskly and praise vigorously! Leave the lather to stand for some minutes to allow the natural ingredients to take effect. Rinse well and repeat if necessary. Use Natura Pets Oatmeal Conditioner for an extra healthy and glossy coat! Don’t forget to reward with a treat! For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes and ears!! Rinse thoroughly if exposed to eyes. Store in a dark, cool place.

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: AllergiClear Pets - Naturally prevents allergies in dogs & cats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Pets
Type: Natural Remedy Capsule
Price: 207.00

AllergiClear Pets is a compound natural remedy containing herbal, homeopathic and nutritional ingredients known for their positive effect on preventing the allergic reactions to allergens such as flea saliva, food, grass, pollen or chemicals.  AllergiClear Pets is a preventative and supportive remedy. This remedy may be used preventatively or acutely. 

  • Reduces and prevents the symptoms of allergic dermatitis, flea bite dermatitis or inhaled allergens such as grass or pollen 
  • Reduces and prevents food & chemical allergies
  • Decreases or eliminates dependence on & side effects of cortisone and antihistamine drugs
  • Improves your pet's overall resistance against allergens and supports the immune system

Ingredients

AllergiClear Pets contains the following natural ingredients in a vegan friendly capsule:

Quercitin, Euphrasia officials (Eyebright), Silica (6C ,) Nat. Mur. (D6), Kali Mur. (D6), Calc Fluor (6C), Calc Phos (6C) 

    Directions for use

    AllergiClear Pets comes in convenient capsule form. The capsules may be opened and mixed with food if desired for easy administration. 

    Dosage

    Capsules may be given whole or opened and mixed with wet food.

    Cats and small dogs: Half capsule twice a day
    Medium dogs: 1 capsule twice daily
    Large dogs: 1-2 capsule twice daily
     
    Caution:     Not recommended during pregnancy and nursing. Not to be used by animals with surgical implants.
     
    NOTE: Use AllergiClear Pets along with Allergy Itch-Ease to provide soothing relief for your pets and stop the constant desire to scratch.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.
